title: Consumed By Lust: A MFM Menage Steamy Romance Novella

And I just agreed to see him again.JuanBlood red heels on the side of the car I'm working under.A frustrated voice asking me to help her out or she's screwed.And that's exactly what I imagine myself doing to this sultry little vixen as I invite her back to the garage after she's done with her coveted job interview. Who knows? I might just get lucky.GiovanniShe is fifteen minutes late and when she finally arrives her uneasiness is blatantly obvious and I have already imagined her underneath me, begging for my cock as she takes a sip of her frothy cappuccino. Yes, it's going to be a pleasure having her working under me.Warning: This is a 14k word steamy menage a trois novella intended for adults only.
author: Selena  Moore
